channel.title: Players online server shown in forum
channel.description:
annyone know how to make [u]There are currently 19 people playing![/u]
when we put on forum header it shown our serve how many players are online.
i dont even dumb??

item.title: Players online server shown in forum
item.dc:creator: @TheJavascriptMaster TheJavascriptMaster
item.description:
@TheJavascriptMaster wrote:

[quote=“Switchbladed, post:23, topic:319262”][quote author=TheJavascriptMaster link=topic=415734.msg3315218#msg3315218 date=1282265132]
^Well About that tutorial i suggest you use my code its much easier, yes its javascript but alot easier to use.

 Players On [<script src=http://fastonlineusers.com/online.php?d=AnyPageOfYourWebsite> </script>]

Change the [quote]AnyPageOfYourWebsite[/quote] To something like http://Websitename.com/webclient.html
and this shows how many people r playing on your website/webclient

-Hope This Solved Your Problem-
[/quote]

Thank you, I needed this too[/quote]

Your Welcome

Read full topic

item.title: Players online server shown in forum
item.dc:creator: @cruel cruel
item.description:
@cruel wrote:

Wow. OP is vague as fuck. “I want to show how many players are on my server. Wut do?”
What server? Web server, online gaming server?
Are these anonymous visitors or authenticated users?

GAWD, and all posts in this thread are fucking pointless and don’t help anyone, except the guy who found the thread at moparscape, which probably answered the thread since he is likely talking about a runescape server.

Read full topic

item.title: Players online server shown in forum
item.dc:creator: @inertia inertia
item.description:
@inertia wrote:

[quote=“Gamer-Hack, post:8, topic:319262”]im not good in server php to add on forum…

that why i need help by mopar.[/quote]

Well unfortunately I don’t know how you have your website and private server set up, and I’m not writing a tutorial on a hypothetical situation. Please give more details on how your highscore works, then I could advise you on how to add a players-online counter.

Read full topic

dont think u are too good.[/quote]

[center] Really?[/center]
